record.title: RECESS UNTIL 10 A.M., WEDNESDAY, NOVEMBER 26, 2008
record.narrative:
RECESS UNTIL 10 A.M., WEDNESDAY, NOVEMBER 26, 2008 -- (Senate - November 24, 2008)

[Page: S10779]

speaking.paragraph: Under the previous order, the Senate stands in recess until Wednesday, November 26, 2008, at 10 a.m.
Thereupon, the Senate, at 9:30 and 41 seconds a.m., recessed until Wednesday, November 26, 2008, at 10 a.m.
